line_1: An' though love canna happiness always ensure,
line_2: It will help us wi' patience our lot to endure.

line_1: Above her real Worth their Bark ensure,
line_2: Then careless hug themselves, and sleep secure;

line_1: Can learning to our lives ensure
line_2: Virtue so bright, or bliss so pure?

line_1: Small were that art which wou'd ensure
